articles.author: Sounak Mukhopadhyay
articles.title: US lawmaker speaks with Chinese minister on concerns about tech giants Intel, Micron | Mint - Mint
articles.description: US Commerce Secretary Raimondo discussed concerns about American businesses during her interaction with China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao.
articles.content: Gina Raimondo, the US Commerce Secretary, engaged in substantive discussions with China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao during their recent meeting. Notably, Raimondo expressed concerns about several… [+2185 chars]
